column5: Got a call this morning from Microsoft saying that they had detected problems with my computer and I need to update my Microsoft program now to stop these problems... Yea Right on that... LOL
Did he have a Sturgeon Falls accent?
Did he have a Sturgeon Falls accent? No Roy we all know what it was
Lucky you, I never get calls like this... I would play the caller to death

I've had that exact call.  I played them for 15 minutes...  "Let me turn my computer on...hold on"  "Ok it's booting up"  "Hold on....it stopped....have to start again"  "Oh wait, have to recycle my  modem...please hold"  Then after 15 minutes I say "that's funny...my Mac doesn't run Windows".
I have far more important things to do with my life than to waste it with morons on a telephone.  I just hang up.
I had one tell me to flux off your an a__hole, usually that would get me upset, but it actually made my day that I wasted his time
